name: Tijd
description: Date of submission from the applicable revenue. Should be unique. Stored as a string.

name: pin
description: Float inserted revenue which is on a pin basis on the given day. Stored as a string.

name: cash
description: Float inserted revenue which is on a cash basis on the given day. Stored as a string.

name: ideal
description: Float inserted revenue which is on an iDEAL basis on the given day. Stored as a string.

name: thuis
description: Float inserted revenue which is coming from Thuisbezorgd on the given day. Stored as a string.

name: total_am
description: Float inserted revenue which is coming from a combination of pin, cash, iDEAL, and Thuisbezorgd on the given day.

name: n_pin
description: Integer inserted that resembled the amount of pin cases on the given day.

name: n_cash
description: Integer inserted amount of cash cases on the given day.

name: n_ideal
description: Integer inserted the number of iDEAL cases on the given day.

name: n_thuis
description: Integer inserted the amount of Thuisbezorgd orders on the given day.

name: n_total
description: Integer inserted for replicating the amount of pin, cash, iDEAL, and Thuisbezorgd cases on the given day.

name: avg_pin
description: The average pin amount by dividing the total amount of pin cases by the number of pin transactions done on that particular date.

name: avg_cash
description: The average cash amount by dividing the total amount of cash by the number of cash transactions done on that particular date.

name: avg_ideal
description: The average iDEAL amount by dividing the total amount of iDEAL cases by the number of iDEAL transactions done on that particular date.

name: avg_thuis
description: The average Thuisbezorgd amount by the total amount of Thuisbezorgd transactions by the number of Thuisbezorgd orders done on that particular date.

name: avg_total
description: The average turnover amount by dividing the total turnover by the amount of transactions (sum of cash, pin, iDEAL, and Thuisbezorgd) done on that particular date.

name: %N_pin
description: Percentage pin cases by the total cases multiplied by 100 on that particular date.

name: %N_cash
description: Percentage cash cases by the total cases multiplied by 100 on that particular date.

name: %N_ideal
description: Percentage iDEAL cases by the total cases multiplied by 100 on that particular date.

name: %N_thuis
description: Percentage of Thuisbezorgd cases by the total cases multiplied by 100 on that particular date.

name: %am_pin
description: Percentage pin transactions by the total turnover multiplied by 100 on that particular date.

name: %am_cash
description: Percentage cash transactions by the total turnover multiplied by 100 on that particular date.

name: %am_ideal
description: Percentage iDEAL transactions by the total turnover multiplied by 100 on that particular date.

name: %am_thuis
description: Percentage of Thuisbezorgd transactions by the total turnover multiplied by 100 on that particular date.
